greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Product_{d|n, d<n} A019565(A003714(d)), where A003714(n) is the n-th Fibbinary number.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..3194
program: A072649(n) = { my(m); if(n<1, 0, m=0; until(fibonacci(m)>n, m++); m-2); }; \\ From A072649
A019565(n) = {my(j,v); factorback(Mat(vector(if(n, #n=vecextract(binary(n), "-1..1")), j, [prime(j), n[j]])~))}; \\ From A019565
xref: Cf. A003714, A019565, A300835 (rgs-transform of this sequence), A300836.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 18 2018
